section.title: Subscribing to the Required Entitlements
section.para: Once you have installed a Red Hat Enterprise Linux base operating system and made sure the system meets the requirements listed in the previous chapter, you must register the system with Red Hat Subscription Manager, and subscribe to the required entitlements to install the Red Hat Virtualization Manager packages.

step.para: Register your system with the Content Delivery Network, entering your Customer Portal user name and password when prompted:
Find the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server and Red Hat Virtualization subscription pools and note down the pool IDs.
Use the pool IDs located in the previous step to attach the entitlements to the system:

note.para: To find out what subscriptions are currently attached, run:
To list all enabled repositories, run:

step.screen: # subscription-manager repos --enable=rhel-7-server-rpms # subscription-manager repos --enable=rhel-7-server-supplementary-rpms # subscription-manager repos --enable=rhel-7-server-rhv-4.0-rpms # subscription-manager repos --enable=jb-eap-7-for-rhel-7-server-rpms

section.para: You have now subscribed your system to the required entitlements. Proceed to the next section to install the Red Hat Virtualization Manager packages.
